add_signature_desc: Sign PDF with drawing or image
extract_text_desc: Extract text from PDF or image
clear_history_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all history?
name: Name
delete_file_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {0}?
privacy_intro: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you use our PDF Utility Pro application.
information_collection_content: We collect information that you provide directly to us when using the application. This includes files you process, settings you configure, and usage patterns.
information_usage_content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, and to develop new ones.
data_security_content: We take measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
third_party_content: Our application may use third-party services that collect information. These services have their own privacy policies.
childrens_privacy_content: Our application is not intended for children under 13 years of age.
changes_to_policy_content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
contact_us_content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@pdfutilitypro.com.
about_app_content: PDF Utility Pro is a comprehensive tool for all your PDF needs. It allows you to create, edit, and manage PDF files with ease.
copyright: Â© 2023 PDF Utility Pro. All rights reserved.
Image to PDF_instructions: Select images from your device or take photos with your camera to convert them into a PDF document.
text_to_pdf_instructions: Enter or paste text to convert it into a PDF document.
enter_text_here: Enter or paste your text here...
enter_data_to_generate: Enter data to generate QR code or barcode
scan_instructions: Point your camera at a QR code or barcode to scan it
excel_to_pdf_instructions: Select an Excel file from your device to convert it into a PDF document.
word_to_pdf_instructions: Select a Word document from your device to convert it into a PDF document.
merge_pdf_instructions: Select multiple PDF files to merge them into a single PDF document. You can reorder the files by dragging them.
split_pdf_instructions: Select a PDF file and specify the pages to split into separate PDF documents.
pages_format_help: Format: page ranges (1-3), individual pages (5), or both (1-3, 5, 7-9)
edit_pdf_instructions: Select a PDF file to edit its content, images, or pages.
edit_text_desc: Modify text content in the PDF
watermark_instructions: Select a PDF file and add a text watermark to it.
signature_instructions: Select a PDF file and draw your signature to add to it.
scanner_instructions: Use your camera to scan documents and convert them into a PDF file.
extract_text_instructions: Select a PDF file or image to extract text from it.
